title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.30 - Definition of mobile food service establishment and pushcart
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.30 - Definition of mobile food service establishment and pushcart

State Regulations
(a) A mobile food service establishment is a self-contained food service operation, located in a vehicle or a movable stand, self-or otherwise propelled, used to store, prepare, display or serve food intended for individual portion service. (b) A pushcart is a cart or barrow, manually propelled, used to vend food intended for individual portion service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-4.30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
